title: What is this font please?
content:
Can you please tell me what is this font ?!!  
Thank you very much ^^

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test_6370.png)

Font: 

 Fire Of Ysgard Carved In Stone 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134530/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [test.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134530/http:/typophile.com/files/test_9.png) | 83.84 KB |
author: pofper

comments.content:
Pofper, it's virtually impossible to identify a typeface from a single letter, but this appears to be something called Fire Of Ysgard Carved In Stone (Regular):

[http://fontpro.com/fire-of-ysgard-font-12074](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134530/http:/fontpro.com/fire-of-ysgard-font-12074 "http://fontpro.com/fire-of-ysgard-font-12074")

EDIT: I identified this from the V you originally posted, but thanks for the bigger sample of letters....

You're welcome.

On a hunch, I searched using the keyword "carved." This font was fourth on the list....
